item.title: Deploy != Release
item.description: Recently we were having a debate about release processes, and I wrote that deployments are not always equal to releases. also deploy != release â€”Andy, baiting discussion in Slack This turned out to be somewhat controversial until we discussed what I specifically meant by deploy and release. As with all things, agreeing on definitions or understanding what someone means when they use a specific term is essential, so I thought I would write down a short blog post on it.
